Just some of my favorites.

ISBN: [9780374533403](https://www.worldcat.org/isbn/9780374533403)

ISBN: [9780593238127](https://www.worldcat.org/isbn/9780593238127)

ISBN: [9780805095159](https://www.worldcat.org/isbn/9780805095159)

ISBN: [9780618610037](https://www.worldcat.org/isbn/9780618610037)

ISBN: [9780387849256](https://www.worldcat.org/isbn/9780387849256)

When Breath Becomes Air, *Paul Kalanithi*  
ISBN: [9780812988406](https://www.worldcat.org/isbn/9780812988406)

ISBN: [9781594482694](https://www.worldcat.org/isbn/9781594482694)

The Immortal Life of Henrietta Lacks, *Rebecca Skloot*  
ISBN: [9781400052172](https://www.worldcat.org/isbn/9781400052172)

I Contain Multitudes: The Microbes Within Us and a Grander View of Life, *Ed Yong*  
ISBN: [9780062368591](https://www.worldcat.org/isbn/9780062368591)
